lead_paragraph: Quality Road, who suffered an injury last year that caused him to miss the Kentucky Derby, remained unbeaten as a 4-year-old Monday with a victory in the Metropolitan Handicap at Belmont Park.
snippet: Quality Road, who suffered an injury last year that caused him to miss the Kentucky Derby, remained unbeaten as a 4-year-old Monday with a victory in the Metropolitan Handicap at Belmont Park.
